name: Foundation Package
title: Focus on building foundation strong
description: This package is designed for 9th and 10th graders and is a great choice for students who have limited access to their school college counselor before 11th grade.  We conduct an assessment of the studentâ€™s interests, strengths, needs and goals; review and assess course selection, grades, extracurricular and summer activities; develop a preliminary plan for standardized testing; and provide a general overview of financial aid.
